# userActivity

**Instance Property**

The user activity that defines the action to perform when invoking the shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
var userActivity: NSUserActivity? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` when you create the shortcut with an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntent] object.
